```
server:
  port: 8090
  application:
    name: myapplication
    url: http://myapplication.com
```

```
server:
  application:
    name: InjectMapFromYAML
    url: http://injectmapfromyaml.dev
    description: How To Inject a map from a YAML File in Spring Boot
  config:
    ips:
      - 10.10.10.10
      - 10.10.10.11
      - 10.10.10.12
      - 10.10.10.13
    filesystem:
      - /dev/root
      - /dev/md2
      - /dev/md4
  users: 
    root:
      username: root
      password: rootpass
    guest:
      username: guest
      password: guestpass
```
